abstract: Taco Bell and Pizza Hut announce that they will rid their products of artificial colors and flavors, becoming latest big food companies to do so.
lead_paragraph: Taco Bell and Pizza Hut say they will get rid of artificial colors and flavors, making them the latest big food companies to do so.

headline.main: Taco Bell and Pizza Hut to Drop Artificial Flavors and Colors
headline.print_headline: Taco Bell and Pizza Hut to Drop Artificial Flavors and Colors

snippet: Taco Bell and Pizza Hut say they will get rid of artificial colors and flavors, making them the latest big food companies to do so.
